CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF(((Total_Rating__c*100) >= 90), "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", IF(((Total_Rating__c*100) >= 80 && Total_Rating__c < 90), "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF(((Total_Rating__c*100) >= 70 && Total_Rating__c < 80), "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(((Total_Rating__c*100) >= 60 && Total_Rating__c < 70), "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(((Total_Rating__c*100) < 60), "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "/img/samples/stars_000.gif" ))))), "Rating")
CustomField.label: Vendor Rating
